member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModule.CreateSession
member.summary: Creates a object representing a Content Decryption Module (CDM) session.
member.param: A member of the that specifies the type of CDM session to create.
An object for receiving key status change updates.

member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModule.CreateTrustedInput
member.summary: Creates an object that implements the decryption of content.
member.param: A BYTE array containing initialization data. contentInitData will only be used if initData from is not provided or incomplete. Initialization Data should be structured in PSSH Box Format. For more details, see the Encrypted Media Extension specification's Common SystemID and PSSH Box Format.
The size of the array in contentInitData.

member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModule.GetProtectionSystemIds
member.summary: Gets a list of SystemIDs that the IMFContentDecryptionModule supports.
member.param: A GUID array in which the SystemIDs are returned.
The count of SystemIDs returned in the systemIds parameter.

member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModule.GetSuspendNotify
member.summary: Retrieves an object for suspend events.
member.param: Receives an object that notifies the Content Decryption Module (CDM) when global resources should be brought into a consistent state prior to suspending.

member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModule.SetContentEnabler
member.summary: Allows the caller to specify the interface that shall be used by the Content Decryption Module (CDM).
member.param: The interface to be used by the CDM.
An that provides information about the result of the operation.

member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModule.SetPMPHostApp
member.summary: Allows the caller to specify the interface, which represents a protected process. The IMFPMPHostApp interface is used by the Content Decryption Module (CDM) to create the IMFTrustedInput object.
member.param: The IMFPMPHostApp representing a protected process.

member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModule.SetServerCertificate
member.summary: Provides a server certificate to be used to encrypt messages to the license server.
member.param: A BYTE array containing the certificate.
The size of the array in certificate.

member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModule
member.summary: Represents a Content Decryption Module (CDM) for a DRM key system.
